remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures are established and used.

numlitem.para: When the service interphone Ground Crew Call Horn is inoperative, use the flight deck interphone Flight Deck to Ground system. If both Flight Deck to Ground systems are inoperative, use standard hand signals. Coordination with ground personnel to ensure mutual understanding of hand signals is mandatory.

placard.para: Placard Ground Crew Call switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: Ensure IRU's are not operating on DC power.
